body:
There haven't been a lot fo these latley! So I decided its time.

https://plug.dj/avicus


⊰ Rules ⊱
1. Please follow the General Etiquette and Behavior section on the Avicus Network Rules located here - http://avicus.net/rules
2. DO NOT meh (Down vote) every song. 
3. Nothing inappropriate (Blood, gore, violence) 
4. Max length is 10 mins
5. No impersonation 
6. Do not play anything in the history

GET  THIS: Plug Cubed - http://plugcubed.net
(Coppied from howsies Saturday plug events from longm ago :C

title: Monday night relaxation! - PlugDJ

replies.body:
Personally, I like this, but today isn't a good day to do it, since most of us are busy with school...

Let's try on Friday..?

and yes, we definitely need more people back on plugdj ;c

I agree with Nolan, doing it on the weekends would be much better.
Though, I'll be going on plug.dj when I'm doing homework. Too bad it's blocked at my school ;l
